My MP‚Äôs response above recognises the scandal of negligence, with a promise of incremental improvements and worried about vast costs.  Yet doesn‚Äôt seem to understand the amendments he voted down:  incremental improvements and enforce compliance  by @EnvAgency. Suggested action...

The amendment isn‚Äôt a ‚Äòban‚Äô of sewerage discharges (see attached).  The amendments are essential 4 progress.
